data.actual_result: The "Done" button keeps the window up, forcing you to hit "Cancel."
data.expected_result: The file should be denied, and the "Done" button should discard the avatar change.
data.short_description: Uploading a 0 bytes .GIF file breaks the "Done" button.
data.steps_to_repro: - Save an empty file in Notepad as "something.gif" ENSURING TO ADD QUOTES AROUND IT  - Try and upload the 0 bytes .GIF you created as a server avatar.
